attributes.action: To not re open schools after the Easter could cause the rate to re rise.
attributes.additional_details: I am concerned for all children’s health and also for the people who have children who may be over 60 which a lot of children do live with their grandads and nanas which could make them ill and since their isn’t no actual symptoms which so up straight away the virus could spread like a wild fire and cause millions of children to get ill and then theirs children who get public transport spreading it to others getting public transport causing the situation to get worse again .
attributes.background: To re-consider opening schools after Easter holidays because the peak could curve and then spike again causing children’s life’s to be in great harms way and kill loads of children since it’s starting to effect us all.
